client.title: Download and install ZimaClient
client.desc: Download and install the ZimaClient client. After launching the client, click on "Scan and connect to Zima". The system will automatically scan and start the initialization process for the new device.
client.tip-start: If you are temporarily unable to install the ZimaClient, please

device.title: Scan and connect to Devices
device.desc: If you are initializing from a mobile device or unable to download and install the ZimaClient client, please proceed with the initialization process by clicking the button below.
device.no-device-tip: Please make sure your Zima device and your equipment are on the same network .

explore.title: Explore Zima
explore.desc: Visit ZimaSpace to explore the next generation of digital asset management.

help.title: Need any help?
help.desc: If you need any detail or support about your products, please visit Our Docs or Contact us
